project-1.title: Anto
project-1.content: Creation and design of the visual identity for a high-end guitar brand. Production of a 3D product animation in Blender and development of an experiential website designed to enhance Anto's unique identity.

project-2.title: Kame House
project-2.content: My first 3D website and my first low poly style scene. I first fully modeled the scene in Blender, optimizing the polygons as much as possible. Then, I integrated the model with Three.js and created some animations with GSAP. This project allowed me to confirm my learning of 5 chapters from the Three.js Journey course and to explore a new style in Blender.

project-3.title: Showcase Site, Visual Identity
project-3.content: This project allowed me to apply numerous integration concepts. I also developed a brand identity, created the logo, harmonized the interfaces to establish visual coherence, and emphasized the user experience. I deeply reflected on the goal and target audience of this project. The answers I obtained guided my design choices.
